messages.title: Putting Plymouth First
messages.content: I'm proud of Plymouth. Together we can make our city an even better place to live.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: A good Brexit deal for Plymouth
keyPolicies.policyDescription: I will fight for a deal to secure our environment, fishing rights and to protect our exporters.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: Stand up for our armed forces
keyPolicies.policyDescription: I will always support our Royal Navy and Royal Marines. Back Trident, scrap the new fleet of frigates and support our veterans.
I will fight for properly funded schools. I want teachers to have the resources to help our students succeed.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: Protect our hospitals and the NHS
keyPolicies.policyDescription: I will oppose Tory cuts and NHS privatisation. Only resources for doctors, nurses and hospitals.

mentions.tacticalSituation: Only Labour can beat the Tories here.

issues.defence: Back Trident and fight Tory cuts to the Royal Navy
issues.economy: scrapping the Tory cuts to capital gains tax
issues.environment: fight for a deal to secure our environment
issues.health: oppose Tory cuts and NHS privatisation

community.content: I will put Plymouth before party and every day work to get a better deal for our city.

politicalExperience.achievements: Campaigning for Plymouth every single day.

contactInformation.address: Plymouth Labour, Lockyer Hall, Alfred St, Plymouth PL1 2RP

endorsements.endorser: Becky Anderson, Mum of two, Plymouth
endorsements.endorsement: As a mother, I’m worried about Tory cuts to our NHS and local schools. It is harder and harder to see my GP and the NHS seems to be in constant crisis. Schools are asking for money to buy vital equipment. I want an MP who will actually stand up for us, not sit on their hands. That is why I am backing Luke, because I believe he will fight for me and my family.

quotes.text: Plymouth is my home. It was where I was born and where I live. It’s time we had an MP who will always put Plymouth first. I lost by just 523 votes in 2015. Only Labour can beat the Tories here. Your vote will make a difference.

examples: I lost by just 523 votes in 2015.

nonPolicyAttributes.localness: Plymouth is my home. It was where I was born and where I live.

examples: Plymouth is my home. It was where I was born and where I live.
As a strong local campaigner, I fight for Plymouth every single day and I’m standing because I think I could do a better job than our current Tory MP. He is failing to stand up for Plymouth.
